questions.question: What advice would you give to help improve the environment?

answers.answer: The politicians could choose and pay for other energy than the nuclear. And they could invest more in renewable energy. It is for all the planet in oneway, not only for one state or one little group.
All of us have to try to keep clean all around, do not throw anything anywhere.
Switch off as soon as you leave a room, light, television computer,...
We can take the bus or the train more often than the car. But the offer in tranport must be adapted (timetable,...). The bicycle is another option.
There are so many other little acts like do not print each e-mail that we receive.
All of this has already been heard. Sorry, I do not have very much new idea.
